experience.title: Operations Coordinator
experience.location: Abu Dhabi Emirate, United Arab Emirates
experience.description: Handling client satisfaction, Outreach & day to day operations. Performing organizational & practical tasks bridging the game between Human Resources & Operations. It is a people's game.

experience.title: Sales Representative
experience.description: I served as a Sales Representative in Beirut and its suburbs, connecting customers with tailored, top-quality products. My deep understanding of local market trends allowed me to consistently deliver exceptional value and service. Building strong client relationships, I guided them to find ideal solutions for their needs, establishing trust and becoming a trusted partner in the Beirut market.

experience.title: Sales Promoter
experience.description: In my previous role as a promoter, I specialized in face-to-face sales, adept at introducing and explaining new products to customers. I excelled in persuasive communication and tailored my approach to individual needs, driving sales through effective personal engagement.

experience.title: Supporter Project Coordinator
experience.description: I provided valuable support to the project coordinator by facilitating the setup of two training sessions and coordinating an activity day. My collaborative efforts involved working closely with 17 volunteers, all in pursuit of our project's mission to promote peer education in a Middle school located in Beqaa.

experience.title: Trainer
experience.description: I conducted training sessions on life skills and leadership skills, delivering classes to refugee students. These sessions covered crucial topics, including physical and mental health, with the overarching goal of enhancing the well-being and resilience of these students.

experience.title: Social Worker & Supervisor
experience.description: I conducted surveys and engaged with refugees to assess their needs while providing emotional support. Collaborating with a dedicated team, I supervised and mentored junior social workers, emphasizing a trauma-informed approach. My role also involved maintaining records and collaborating with organizations to enhance resource availability. I promoted ethical standards and social justice and provided reproductive health support and awareness to refugee parents.

experience.title: Community mobilizer
experience.description: As a community mobilizer in the past, my role revolved around uniting and empowering local communities. I orchestrated various initiatives to drive positive change and enhance community well-being, fostering a sense of togetherness and shared purpose.

experience.title: Social Worker
experience.description: As a social worker, my mission was to provide essential support and advocacy to individuals and communities in need. I conducted assessments, facilitated access to resources, and offered emotional guidance, all while upholding the highest ethical standards. My commitment to improving the lives of others through compassionate care and assistance defined my role in the field.

experience.title: Social Worker
experience.description: I have had the privilege of being a dedicated trainer, specializing in children aged 10 to 18 years old, where I focused on conducting activities aimed at improving their skills. My role involved nurturing their growth and development through tailored, interactive programs. I took pride in inspiring a lifelong love for learning while equipping them with the essential skills for success in their past experiences.
